Home Mush The Lounge Roleplay[SG] TOS: A New Beginning
On august 11, 2014
EoNightcore

Welcome back Welcome back to The Open Story!

Welcome! and this time some new rules!

  • No controlling an entire organization, you're all pieces of a machine from now on, not a full machine going to murder everyone just because you feel like it! Only those given King status can actually control huge Organizations like kingdoms or companies.
  • To gain King Status, you must be approved by at least 3 players.
    ^Above rules do not apply if you control a small organization, like a party, because that's really not organized.
  • Sure sure, have your characters meet each other and fight/flirt/stare/ETC... with each other!
  • This is a fantasy world, but no one said anything about not including SciFi elements... BUT KEEP IT MOSTLY FANTASY HERE!

It's a story everyone has heard, every 100 years the Demon Lord comes back and terrorizes the world, and then a hero arises who defeats the demon lord.

However, this story is not that story, for in this story, the demon lord never arose after 100 years, and this caused a disturbance in the world.

All of a sudden, the people were free from the threat of the Demons! They were free to expand and prosper!

But not all is well, for old rivalries are rekindled and former allies start to bicker.

Will the newfound peace last? Or will this world devolve into Total War?

Who knows? What anyone does know, is that this is
A New Beginning
On august 11, 2014

So when I'm busy DrWinner can take care of it. If it's okay with you, DrWinner, I'll give the detail somewhere around tomorrow.
On august 11, 2014
EoNightcore

Thump, thump, thump, thump, thump, thump, thump, thump

Several soldiers walked through on the roads, an army of the Kingdom of Cyrus, about to wage war.

Cyrus General: Stop! Hold positions!

Cyrus Officer 1: Hold positions!

Cyrus Officer 2: Hold your positions men!

The army stopped, and on the other side was another army from the Kingdom of Falmouth.

Silence....

A messenger was sent out to meet with the Falmouth's leader.

Cyrus Messenger: The King of Cyrus has asked you to remove your forces from this land, as you are passing on Cyrus Territory.

Falmouth General: And if I say no?

Cyrus Messenger: Then we have no choice but to declare wa-

The messenger's head was cut clean off by the Falmouth General.

Falmouth General: MEN! WE CONQUER THIS LAND IN THE NAME OF THE KING!

The Falmouth Army: LONG LIVE THE KING OF FALMOUTH! LONG LIVE THE KING!

Cyrus General: Officer?

Cyrus Officer 1: Sir?

Cyrus General: Ready the Dragon Knights. War is coming to this land.

Cyrus Officer 1: Yes sir.

The Officer mentioned to a nearby soldier on a horse, Erik, a peasant drafted into the army.

Cyrus Officer 1: Ready the Dragon Knights boy, we're going to war.

Erik: Ye-Yes Sir!

Erik quickly went to the back of the lines with his stallion.

Cyrus General: MEN! READY YOUR WEAPONS!

Th Cyrus Army stood at attention.

Cyrus General: MARCH!

THUMP, THUMP, THUMP

Cyrus General: MEN OF CYRUS! ON MY COMMAND!

Falmouth General: ON MY COMMAND MEN!

The Armies got closer.

Both Generals: CHARGE!!!
On august 11, 2014
EoNightcore

Erik's horse went as fast as it could, on the left was a huge grassland, on the right, a forest, and in front, the road.

Erik: We must hurry! Hurry!

All of a sudden, a gleaming silver of light, and Erik's Horse collapsed, and so did Erik.

Erik: Gah! Boy! What's wrong!

An arrow protruded out of the horse.

Erik: Don't tell me! No... this isn't Falmouth crafting... this is....

Erik quickly pulled out his sword, and several brutish figures came out of the forest.

Erik: Orcs, why it'd have to be Orcs?

On august 12, 2014
Harrivchan

Creak....

The door let out a loud creak as Arthur opened it, He silently tip-toed to the basement. Where his father old weaponry is stored.

Arthur: "Sorry, Father. But i need to do this."

He grabbed his father old sword and dusted it, The Heartseeker. Legend says it was once used to slay the Demon lord, And only someone with a golden heart and a brave soul can unlock its true power. While there he grabbed a bunch of potion and some food, He shoved them all in his satchel and went back.

Arthur: "Nero, You're coming with me."

The cat suddenly woke up and followed him, Arthur was hesitant for a moment, Before opening the front door.

Arthur: "Goodbye, My family....."
On august 12, 2014
[8356287]

Aurelia's long, straight, platinum hair fluttered behind her as she ran swiftly through the woods. The arrows in her quiver scarcely jostled with the grace of her movement. She hopped onto a large fallen tree and leaped toward a branch above her, swinging once and then pulling herself up. She climbed to the top of the canopy and peered out to see the smoke billowing up from the eastern horizon - Cyrus territory.
On august 12, 2014
Harrivchan

Even though Arthur is not part of the knights, He always dreamed to be one, And tonight is his big chance, Win this war and he might be vouched for his bravery.

Arthur: "This is my one and only chance of joining, Come on, Nero. The Cyrus need us."

He unsheathed his sword and ran toward the war zone, But everything is the opposite of what he expected, Blood and gore is everywhere. He wimped out and hid on a giant rock.
On august 12, 2014
Harrivchan

Arthur was covered in fear, This is far from his expectation of "war". He tilted his head to the right to take a tiny peek, One of the soldiers is being attacked by the ogres! He signaled Nero to stay put behind the rock, Mixed with fear, Adrenaline, And pure instinct, He raised his sword and rushed to Erik.

Arthur: "Let us defend this place!"

On august 12, 2014
EoNightcore

Erik quickly blocked a blow from an orc (Whom Arthur assumed was an ogre), and was driven to his knees.

Arthur quickly dispatched the Orc, it's attention was elsewhere, and Arthur had learned swordplay in his spare time... well, what counted as swordplay.

The Orcs quickly ran from the battle, as they were a small simple raiding party, and not an army.

Arthur: Are you OK? These Orges must mean the Demon Lord is here!

Erik: I don't give a shit! I just need to get to the Dragon Knights!

Arthur: The Dragon Knights?! I'll take you there!

Erik arose.

Erik: T-Then take me there at once.
On august 12, 2014
EoNightcore

Vivian Esmerelda of Shakell watched from a distance.

General: Are you ok dear?

Vivian: Oh, just fine father. Just fine.

General: Come, you best not watch this, the affairs of war are of no matter to a young lady such as yourself.

Vivian: Then father, why did you bring along a suit of armor, custom-made, and too small for you to wear?

General: Because... because... alright, you win, but really, you need not worry about the affairs of battle until you are of age.

Vivian: And when will I be of age?!

General: Calm down, you will be of age 1 year from now, on your birth date.

Vivian: Good, because then I could murder some basterds then.

General: You really are like your mother, she was a fiery one, especially in bed.

Vivian: Father!

General: Ahahahaha! The same temper as well!

An Officer came walking in, and then hesitated upon seeing Vivian.

General: Yes Officer? You have something for me?

Cyrus Officer: Yes Lord of Shakell, the battlefield requires your attention.

General Shakell: Very well Officer, you may go. Vivian? Head back to Shakell, and bring along your Guard, if needed, you may test out your armor on the way to Shakell.

Vivian; But... But I can help you fight Father!

General Shakell: No Vivian, you must stay safe. As long as you are not of age, I will not risk you in battle.

Vivian: But-

General Shakell: That is final Vivian.

Vivian:...fine.

General Shakell: That's my girl.

GreatestKracken

RNGKThe battle has just begone... the battle for the world... many years ago our greatest people had fallen... but now THEY are needed.

In the skies above a strange aurora glows a bright greenish blue.
The sign of coming war, the sign of new rebirth. The battle for Re- the world has just begun.

(I'm still recovering from the fall of the Daedalous, but I might be on here. Maybe.)

EoNightcore

Slash! Clink!

The sounds of battle echoed through field.

Fire your volley!

A swarm of arrows flew, killing several.

Charge! These dogs shall fall before us!

Clink! Clunk! FOOSH~ BDOOM!

Gah! My Knee! There's an arrow in there!

Mages! Ready your spells! On my mark!

Slink! Clunk! Slash!

Fire!

This battle was going to take a long time.

[8337275]

Ara watches the battle from the tree, the scroll with the tale of the Daedalus in a crudely fashioned bag around her shoulder.
Ara: Darwin, should I help them?
Darwin: There is no danger to the cat colony currently, mistress. It is your call.
Ara: BY THE POWERS VESTED IN ME! ICE STORM!
It begins hailing on the battle.
On august 12, 2014
EoNightcore
DrWinnerAra watches the battle from the tree, the scroll with the tale of the Daedalus in a crudely fashioned bag around her shoulder.
Ara: Darwin, should I help them?
Darwin: There is no danger to the cat colony currently, mistress. It is your call.
Ara: BY THE POWERS VESTED IN ME! ICE STORM!
It begins hailing on the battle.

Hail came out of nowhere, hitting all with no discrimination. Cyrus? Falmouth? The Ground? It hit them all. The confusion and the hail killed almost as many as the battle did, but at least the battle was halted.
On august 13, 2014
EoNightcore

Two horses galloped to Shakell.

Guard: Halt! State your business!

Erik: I have a message for the Dragon Knights from Lord Shakell.

Guard: Very well, Open the gates!

The Gates opened, and Arthur and Erik entered the city of Shakell.

3 minutes later, Vivian's Guard arrived at the city gates.

Guard: Ah! It's Lady Esmeralda! Open the Gates!

Vivian: Well, that was boring.

And Vivian's Guard entered the city.
On august 13, 2014
EoNightcore

Ice hailed all around, and the men were forced to wait on two sides.

Anyone caught on the wrong side was subjected to imprisonment, or death.

Nearby, a mage watched this unfold.

Jaina: (thinking) This clearly wasn't my magic, so who's is it?

Jaina "Ice Queen" was here to observe if the rumors about Humans were true, but she could not for as long as the hail decided to randomly hail.

Darwin: Mistress, I suspect you are placing the humans into considerable distress.
Ara: Really? Fine.
Ara stares into the hailstorm!
Ara: Garbled return to me! End the hail and we'll flee the scene!
A bright blue light zaps into Ara's hand.
Ara: We need to return to the colony. It's time to move!

And thus, the first battle of Shakell ended.

Erik and Arthur went up the tower, climbing to the Dragon Knight's domain.

Erik: So, you've always wanted to be a Dragon Knight?

Arthur: Are you kidding? They are my dream, my destiny, I just don't want to be a Dragon Knight, I have to be one!

Erik: I've never had that dream, I've always wanted to take after my father, take on the fishing business, find a wife, live happy.

Arthur: That's a dull dream.

Erik: I'm a dull person.

Arthur: Damn, this staircase is long, how much longer is this going to take?

[8337275]

Darwin: Mistress, I think this shall be the perfect location for us.
Ara: A vacant town, right in between Orc lands and human? Oh yes, they'll never find us. I wonder why the people who lived here left.
Darwin: I believe because they were targeted by the other race because they were so close.
Ara: No matter. Einstein! Bach! Get to work on that Godess tower!
A meow is heard, and a cat walks up on two legs.
Einstein: Right away mistress.
Einstein walks away, a hammer in his paws. Bach is right behind him, a bag of Godess stone on his shoulder.
Ara: Everyone else, begin making this place secure! We need walls and sentries!
Darwin: Perhaps you should make your friend give us a shield, mistress.
Ara: Great idea! Garbled! Shield us from people's eyes and ears!
Ara raises her hand, and a blue light shields the town as far as 5 miles away.
On august 13, 2014
[8337275]

The Godess tower, left behind in the forest, begins to glow slightly. It appears to be attempting to call attention to itself.
On august 13, 2014
[8356287]

Up in the forest canopy, Aurelia had seen a strange cloud instantly appear in the eastern sky, raining down on a single spot for many minutes, and then vanishing just as quickly. She stayed there, clinging to a branch, for almost an hour, watching and waiting. The nearby town was quiet and still, abandoned by its residents days prior. Just as she was about to descend, the town disappeared within a blue light.

Aurelia squinted, and her ears perked up. She scrambled up higher until the tree-top started to bend over, and then spread her wings and swooped down toward the blue light where the town had been.
On august 13, 2014
[8337275]

Ara enters a household, lying down upon the crude wooden bed and falling asleep.
Darwin jumps up, cuddling beside her.
Many other cats come, jumping onto Ara, curling into balls, and falling asleep.
The only cats awake are Einstein, Bach, and the three cats on guard duty.
On august 13, 2014
[8356287]

Aurelia flew down toward the glowing hemisphere and landed just outside of it. She drew an arrow from her quiver and slowly pushed it into the light. Arcs of energy emanated from the point of penetration and pulsated along its surface. She pulled the arrow back out and saw [DrWinner].
On august 13, 2014
[8337275]
VersatioAurelia flew down toward the glowing hemisphere and landed just outside of it. She drew an arrow from her quiver and slowly pushed it into the light. Arcs of energy emanated from the point of penetration and pulsated along its surface. She pulled the arrow back out and saw buildings, and... cats? before the hole filled back up, and then the hemisphere disappeared.

The blue light soars into Ara's hand, but only Einstein and Bach notice. They stop working on the Godess tower and begin searching for the cause of the shield going down.
On august 13, 2014
[8356287]

Aurelia blinked. The abandoned town had appeared before her again. Two cats rounded the corner of a building and stared at her. They looked at each other, almost as if they were communicating, and then back toward her again.

She placed the arrow back into her quiver, and then gave a single nod to the felines.

Ara wakes up, and all the cats climb off of her.

On august 13, 2014
[8356287]

Aurelia had remained perfectly calm as the cats jumped up to scratch her. They seemed to be surprised by her non-resistance, and meowed to each other briefly before bounding off toward another building.

Moments later, a woman came out and turned to see her. Aurelia's ornate silver headband was glowing with a pale yellow light as the scratches on her arm slowly healed and disappeared. She opened her hands in a gesture of peace and nodded once more.
On august 13, 2014

Ara walks forward, palm extended toward Aurelia.
Ara: This remains a secret, you understand? Tell no one!
Ara extends her hand.
Ara: Shake it, and enter into a pact. There will be no breaking that.
Ara's hand glows blue.

On august 13, 2014
EoNightcore

Erik entered the Dragon Knight's domain, a small settlement built into the side of the mountain. The only way up here was to climb up a long tower that had a strong bridge that you had to climb over.

The Dragon Knights didn't really have any strong defenses mind the height, but they could fly, so if the bridge or tower were taken out, they were nigh unstoppable here.

Erik: Ooooh god, we're finally here!

Erik fell to his knees.

Arthur arrived sweaty and panting

Arthur: "Pant pant Yes! Freedom at last!"

He fell to the floor, While Nero jumped on his back and curled up.

Erik: Tired huh? Say, I never got your na-

???: Are you the new recruits?

Erik looked up.

Erik: What?

???: Are you two the new recruits for the Dragon Knights?

Erik: Umm... I need to speak to the leader of the Dragon Knights.

Dragon Knight's Leader: Speaking.

Erik: Lord Shakell has requested your presence at Shakell, a battle is going on, and human armies fight each other at each given moment.

Dragon Knight's Leader?: That is bad, I must inform the Leader.

Erik: But... I thought you were the Leader.

A Dragon Knight came up the stairs.

True Dragon Knight Leader: No, he's just messing around with you, I am the true Leader of the Dragon Knights. However, I will only head to the battlefield on one condition. You two, who have managed to make it up here in a day, where normally it would take at least 3 days for most to get up here. So I will assist the forces of Cyrus and Shakell, but only if you two join the Dragon Knights.

On august 13, 2014
[8356287]
DrWinnerAra walks forward, palm extended toward Aurelia.
Ara: This remains a secret, you understand? Tell no one!
Ara extends her hand.
Ara: Shake it, and enter into a pact. There will be no breaking that.
Ara's hand glows blue.

Aurelia stared at the glowing hand and slowly nodded. She looked up into Ara's eyes and spoke with a voice that resonated in two octaves at once:

"You serve the Goddess, do you not? ...Very well, I will give you my word, as the last of the Enovali, that I will reveal to none what I have seen here. But I must ask something in return: harm not the trees of this forest, nor the creatures who call it their home."

She extended her hand and her headband shone radiantly with golden light.

On august 14, 2014
EoNightcore

Night came, and the Cyrus soldiers returned to the City of Shakell, while the forces of Falmouth camped on the plains.

Neither commander had fought during the night, and neither intended to start so.

Meanwhile, at the Dragon Knight's Settlement, John Fletcher prepared his Knights.

John: Dragon Knights! A battle has begun on human land! And it was instigated by none other then by fellow humans! As our duty as the Defenders of the Land, we must calm the situation down, and prevent war from happening! This was our ancestor's vow, and this we shall carry out! Dragon Knights! We Fly!

Dragon Knights: Hoo ha!

A small force of Dragon Knights left the mountain, and flew in the darkness towards the city of Shakell.

On august 14, 2014
EoNightcore

Erik and Arthur, with a squirming Nero in his arms, were led by a strange woman with red hair, and a strange headband that had dragon horns on it. She led them to several doors, and she opened two.

Female Dragon Knight?: So, these are your rooms. Congrats you two! You're roommates!

Erik: Sooo... um....

Female Dragon Knight?: Yes?

Erik: Are those horns real?

Female Dragon Knight?: Feel them and tell me yourself.

Erik touched the horns, and quickly backed away and pulled out his sword.

Arthur: What? What's wrong? Why did you back away Erik?

Arthur touched the horns, and then backed away with eyes in shock, dropping Nero in the process. Who proceeded to run off. The Female Dragon Knight proceeded to smile

Female Dragon Knight?: As you may have noticed, yes, they are real.

Arthur: Who are you?

Female Dragon Knight?: Merial Fletcher Burnwing of the Red Dragon Clan. Mother, Wife, and Teacher.

Arthur and Erik stared before one finally spoke.

Erik: So... are you Sir Fletcher's mount?

Merial: Oh no! Only in bed.

Erik quickly blushed at the thought, and entered his room.

Arthur: Umm, excuse me, I need to go look for Nero.

EoNightcore

A robed person entered the city of Shakell, unnoticed among the crowd of refugees fleeing the city.

Walking quickly, he entered the Sunny Well Inn.

Robed Person: A room for one.

Innkeeper: That'll be 10 copper pieces.

Robed Person: Can I also get 1 cup of water?

Innkeeper: That'll be another 3 copper pieces.

The person put down 13 copper coins, and was handed a key and a cup of water.

Heading to his room, he placed the cup of water on the bed.

He then proceeded to put his finger in the water, freezing it. The hood came off, and the he, was really a she.

OOC: Alright alright, 1 battle later.

The Falmouth army retreated, it's forces beaten and left wounded on the battlefield, as the Cyrus army celebrated.

John and his Knights landed near Lord Shakell's Guard.

Lord Shakell: Thank you Dragon Knights! With your assistance we have managed to beat back the Falmouth army and saved Shakell!

Sir John: The honor is all mine, but not all the credits go to us Dragon Knights, a mysterious warrior has also joined us in this battle, seeking to prove his worth so that we may listen to his belief in a mysterious foe.

The Legend walks to the group.

Sir John: Speak of the person, he is here now.

Legend: Do you believe me now?

On august 14, 2014
GreatestKracken
EoNightcore

OOC: Alright alright, 1 battle later.

The Falmouth army retreated, it's forces beaten and left wounded on the battlefield, as the Cyrus army celebrated.

John and his Knights landed near Lord Shakell's Guard.

Lord Shakell: Thank you Dragon Knights! With your assistance we have managed to beat back the Falmouth army and saved Shakell!

Sir John: The honor is all mine, but not all the credits go to us Dragon Knights, a mysterious warrior has also joined us in this battle, seeking to prove his worth so that we may listen to his belief in a mysterious foe.

The Legend walks to the group.

Sir John: Speak of the person, he is here now.

Legend: Do you believe me now?

Sir John: Your fighting skill, yes, as for your mentioned foe? Not really, all you told us was that there was a mysterious foe that seeked to destroy this land, and not much else.

Erik felt the most pain he had ever felt in his life, and then his closed eyes truly went black.

On august 16, 2014
EoNightcore

ello ello, I am going to be on shortly.
More family-related stuff.......................... boring? Yes, most of the time. important? Yes, very important. Very boring? So boring I could fall asleep, if I tired enough that is, and I'm not often tired enough.


Meanwhile in Shakell Mansion!

Erik awoke, tied to a chair.

Erik: Ah, shit, my head, what happened?

Girl?: That is what I would like to ask.

Erik: Who? Who are you?!

Girl?: Huanna Agnes of Shakell, the sister of the girl you almost killed.

Erik: Girl I almost killed? I, I have no idea what you're talking about.

Huana: Lies! You lying peasant! You know perfectly well what I'm talking about!

Erik: No! I'm serious, I don't!

Huana: Well I'm going to ge-

Vivian: Huana! I can interrogate my own suspects, thank you very much!

Huana: But he tried to kill you!

Vivian: Yes, and I am the one who is training to become chief of security. I do believe I am more qualified then you to question my suspects.

Huana: Bu- but- but-... Fine! You always have it your way!

Vivian: Just go, we'll talk it out later.

Huana rushed off in an angry mood, slamming the door.

Erik: So... ummm... what are you going to do to me?

Vivian: Nothing really....

Vivian pulled out a whip and started coming towards Erik.

Vivian: Not too many have bested me, peasant.

Erik: I prefer Erik, and what are you doing?

Vivian smiled, and licked her lips.

Vivian: Nothing really, nothing really....

And thus a rumor about the haunted room of screams were made.

More family-related stuff.......................... boring? Yes, most of the time. important? Yes, very important. Very boring? So boring I could fall asleep, if I tired enough that is, and I'm not often tired enough.


Meanwhile in Shakell Mansion!

Erik awoke, tied to a chair.

Erik: Ah, shit, my head, what happened?

Girl?: That is what I would like to ask.

Erik: Who? Who are you?!

Girl?: Huanna Agnes of Shakell, the sister of the girl you almost killed.

Erik: Girl I almost killed? I, I have no idea what you're talking about.

Huana: Lies! You lying peasant! You know perfectly well what I'm talking about!

Erik: No! I'm serious, I don't!

Huana: Well I'm going to ge-

Vivian: Huana! I can interrogate my own suspects, thank you very much!

Huana: But he tried to kill you!

Vivian: Yes, and I am the one who is training to become chief of security. I do believe I am more qualified then you to question my suspects.

Huana: Bu- but- but-... Fine! You always have it your way!

Vivian: Just go, we'll talk it out later.

Huana rushed off in an angry mood, slamming the door.

Erik: So... ummm... what are you going to do to me?

Vivian: Nothing really....

Vivian pulled out a whip and started coming towards Erik.

Vivian: Not too many have bested me, peasant.

Erik: I prefer Erik, and what are you doing?

Vivian smiled, and licked her lips.

Vivian: Nothing really, nothing really....

And thus a rumor about the haunted room of screams were made.

On august 17, 2014
EoNightcore

Jaina stepped unto the Shakell estate, but then a dragon landed nearby, and a dragon knight dismounted.

Deven: Jaina? What are you doing here?

Jaina: Deven! How has your family been?

Deven: Just fine, just fine. So what are you doing here?

Jaina: I felt a strange power here a few days ago, so I came here to find it's cause.

Deven: Oh good, but you mind doing me a favor?

Jaina: Yes, it's the least I could do.

Deven: I hear a little thief tried sneaking into my father's mansion, managed to knock out both himself and my little sister.

Jaina: Which one?

Deven: The one who likes to play soldier.

Jaina: Ah, Vivian.

Deven: Yep....

The two entered the Shakell Mansion.
On august 17, 2014
EoNightcore

Deven and Jaina entered the room. Vivian was standing over Erik, who was still tied up.

Vivian: -ike the taste of my foot? Well, do you! Eat it you little thief! Eat it and swear your loyalty to me!

Deven: Vivian!

Vivian quickly snapped around to look at Deven and Jaina, and blushed.

Vivian: Umm, I wasn't doing anything!

Erik: Help me!

10 minutes later!

Erik: Thank you, I don't know how much more I could have taken.

Deven: Alright Erik, why did you steal the Ancient Blade of the Heroes?

Erik: I... don't know, it felt like something was controlling me.

Deven looked at Jaina, and she nodded.

Deven: Alright recruit, what was controlling you?

Erik: I... don't know.

Jaina shook her head this time.

Deven: You do know! You know and I will ta-

Jaina: Deven, back off.

Deven: Fine.

Deven backed away.

Jaina: Sooo... Erik, I hear you held the Ancient Blade, and only heroes of the land can hold the Blade, and thus I must examine you for a Symbol of the Hero.

Erik: Anything, just please, I don't want to be here any longer.

Jaina took Erik's left wrist and removed the leather armor. A strange black mark shown on it.

Jaina: This marking... wait, let me verify it is a real marking.

Jaina: (magic) Teko ow hte Lanx.

The marking glowed a deep red.

Jaina gave a deep breath.

Jaina: Oh my god....

Vivian: What? What's wrong?

Jaina: This person is a direct descendent of the first Hero of the Land... the Demon Lord.

Silence........

[5367939]

The brush pile suddenly collapsed in on something as it stirred.

After a long moment, out of the edges of the very large pile of brush, a man appeared.

He was wearing the brush as clothing, he peered at the trees and the scenery, and began to walk through the deep forest.

The other wild things paid him no mind, as though he was one of them he walked through their midst.

He wondered why he woke, and where, exactly, he was going.

On august 18, 2014
EoNightcore

Power in the land passed by quickly, thus quick coronations were often made to ensure the chain of command did not die out.

Priest: All hail his highness of the Kingdom of Cyrus, King Albert the IV! May his reign last longer then his father King Harold the III!

The citizens of Cyrus bowed down before their new king.

========================

The King of Cyrus looked towards his military advisor, an old friend of his father.

Albert IV: Tell me, what did my father do with the Key?

Advisor: He buried it, and vowed to never uncover it.

Albert IV: My father was a fool, we should never throw away our advantages.... Find the key, I trust you can do this.

Advisor: As you command King Albert.

Or [ ok last one here ] everyone is really that busy with real life

On august 23, 2014
EoNightcore

Erik: That crystal... it was similar to the one that controlled me.

Vivian: Really? Are you sure?

Erik: Yes, except the other crystal was black... but that crystal, it hums with evil energies.

Vivian: This... is big, we have to tell my father!

========================

Lord Shakell: John, I will not listen to your nonsense! That crystal shall save Shakell from Falmouth!

Sir John: But Lord Shakell! That crystal will corrupt you! It's a crystal from evil forces more demonic then the Demon Lord himself!

Lord Shakell: No it isn't! It hums with bright good inside of it!... Perhaps you have been away from the city for too long John, it's time for you to leave, leave Shakell, I EXHILE YOU AND YOUR DRAGON KNIGHTS FROM THE CITY OF SHAKELL!

Sir John: But your son is one of ours!

Lord Shakell: No, he is a Shakell!

Sir John:... Julius... I take my leave.

Sir John left the room, and closed the door.

Vivian: Sir Fletcher?

John: Vivian?! What, speak quickly, your father has refused patronage to us Dragon Knights, even though we were friends.

Vivian: I... wish to join you, my father is a madman.

John: And give up your Shakell name?

Vivian: Then I shall take another! Erik!

Erik came forward.

Erik: Yes my lady?

Vivian: From now on, you don't serve Vivian Shakell, from now on you serve Vivian Fisher.

Erik: Is... that a proposal?

Vivian: Yes, something wrong?

Erik: Ummm... no.

Huana: Wait! I'm coming too!

Vivian: Huana!

Huana: I want to go out! See the world! Father always pampered you Vivian! But no more! I refuse to serve a reluctant parent for a Father!

John: Then let us depart, we must leave before your father decides to send troops after us.

In the Dragon Knight's Settlement.

On august 28, 2014
EoNightcore

Meanwhile, in some other part of the universe really really far away.

Mr. Her: Welcome Class, to Aweseomness 101. Now most of you are wondering, Mr. Her, why do heroes always shout the name of their spells? Well, I'm here to tell you why, but first, a demonstration.

Mr. Her: Feem? You may proceed.

Feem: Yes Mr. Her.

Feem put his hand up into the shape of a gun, and focused all his Ki into one point, firing at the dummy, and a small ki "laser" came out of the hand "gun" and passed through the dummy.

Mr. Her: Good, now shout out the name of the technique this time.

Feem put his hand up again in the shape of a gun, but this time....

Feem: KI BLASTER!!!

The ki "laser" went through the dummy, causing a huge air flow to push it back into the wall, causing a fracture in the shape of a dummy, and then the dummy splintered into multiple parts from the force.

Mr. Her: As you can observe, the dummy was hurt in the first example, but completely obliterated in the second.

Classmate: But Mr Her?! Why is that?

Mr. Her: We have no idea, but we believe it has something to do with looking awesome....
On august 28, 2014
[5367939]

Meanwhile, in some other part of the universe really really far away.

Mr. Her: Welcome Class, to Aweseomness 101. Now most of you are wondering, Mr. Her, why do heroes always shout the name of their spells? Well, I'm here to tell you why, but first, a demonstration.

Mr. Her: Feem? You may proceed.

Feem: Yes Mr. Her.

Feem put his hand up into the shape of a gun, and focused all his Ki into one point, firing at the dummy, and a small ki "laser" came out of the hand "gun" and passed through the dummy.

Mr. Her: Good, now shout out the name of the technique this time.

Feem put his hand up again in the shape of a gun, but this time....

Feem: KI BLASTER!!!

The ki "laser" went through the dummy, causing a huge air flow to push it back into the wall, causing a fracture in the shape of a dummy, and then the dummy splintered into multiple parts from the force.

On august 28, 2014
EoNightcore

Lune: Worker, is the production of the colony ship finished?

Worker: Yes your highness.

Lune: I see....

Lune pushed his hand against the ground.

Lune: I'm sorry mother, but father does nothing while life itself is being corrupted by two outside influences.

A female figure came out of the ground.

Luna: That is fine Lune, I shall watch over this planet, and one day, shall watch life itself reclaim this planet. Perhaps one day, the very people you saved will come back and reclaim it, but today, you shall flee with them.

Lune: Mother.

Lune hugged his mother.

Lune: May the Stars watch over you, good bye.

Luna cried.

Luna: Do not grieve son, you won't be gone forever.

====================================

A stranger went through the Shakell dungeons, touching a block that stood out from the rest, but only if you were looking for it.

A door appeared and the stranger walked through it.

He found himself staring at a gleaming metal box, an ancient artifact from the golden age of the Gods.

And he entered the ship.

???: So, this is where my glorious ship has been....... someone has been using the cloning chambers.

The stranger accessed the ancient computers.

access recent files

On august 29, 2014
EoNightcore

The stranger left the dungeons, and when he left the city of Shakell, he clicked open a remote bomb detonator and clicked.

Several Explosions, or rather, "Earthquakes" rocked the city of Shakell.

The mighty ancient dungeons/caverns of Shakell were no more, as the city itself was sucked up into a giant hole. Snow came off the mountain that once hosted the Dragon Knights, causing an avalanche that threatened to kill the survivors of the "Earthquakes", and trap all those inside the former Settlement of the Dragon Knights.

Well, using the TOS system we roll one dice

88%

And then we roll another to determine if it hits or not.

28
But that's just version 1, I'm thinking about using both unfixed and fixed %.
On august 30, 2014
EoNightcore
EoNightcore

Well, using the TOS system we roll one dice

88%

And then we roll another to determine if it hits or not.

28
But that's just version 1, I'm thinking about using both unfixed and fixed %.

To determine if it hits,

the second number has to be lower then the first.

So in this case, yes, it hit.

Dragonicei dont even know how the grip percentage works but whatever....lets just do it so that the attack post is where it's added...and not just a random post

It's trying to take full hold of the dragon.
100% it's caught the dragon.

(Storm): "Fancy seeing you... you are?"
(Storm) is not his real name... he doesn't know his name.

Fara casts dispell!
The +5% is now a +1% per turn.
On august 30, 2014
GreatestKracken

73% +1% per attack.

50% or lower grip: all our damage is doubled but 50% chance to hit.
50% grip means every attack we roll a d20. 1 = It loses grip.

25% grip means every attack we roll a d10. 1 = It loses grip.
On august 30, 2014

grip= 73%-10%+1%

On august 31, 2014
[821509]

I ask him the price of the shield, and its stats and defense rating, like what it can do
On august 31, 2014
GreatestKracken
DragoniceI ask him the price of the shield, and its stats and defense rating, like what it can do

He says you cnnot buy it, but it is free to anyone who wins the best pet contest.
It has a 25% chance to block all damage.
Can block like that 25 times before being slightly broken.
After 25 more times it becomes broken.
It can be repaired at any smithy for a small price, aslong as they have the materials.

So, enemies with a 50% chacne to hit roll with a flip coin, heads they hit, and then another d4, 4 = shield blocks.

Boosted to 50% vs. ranged attacks.

Can be upgraded at a price.

On august 31, 2014
[5367939]
EoNightcore

Welcome back Welcome back to The Open Story!

Welcome! and this time some new rules!


  • No controlling an entire organization, you're all pieces of a machine from now on, not a full machine going to murder everyone just because you feel like it! Only those given King status can actually control huge Organizations like kingdoms or companies.
  • To gain King Status, you must be approved by at least 3 players.
    ^Above rules do not apply if you control a small organization, like a party, because that's really not organized.
  • Sure sure, have your characters meet each other and fight/flirt/stare/ETC... with each other!
  • This is a fantasy world, but no one said anything about not including SciFi elements... BUT KEEP IT MOSTLY FANTASY HERE!It's a story everyone has heard, every 100 years the Demon Lord comes back and terrorizes the world, and then a hero arises who defeats the demon lord.

    However, this story is not that story, for in this story, the demon lord never arose after 100 years, and this caused a disturbance in the world.

    All of a sudden, the people were free from the threat of the Demons! They were free to expand and prosper!

    But not all is well, for old rivalries are rekindled and former allies start to bicker.

    Will the newfound peace last? Or will this world devolve into Total War?

    Who knows? What anyone does know, is that this is
    A New Beginning

Cause the crystal guardian are not a organization, and breaking the rules... right gk?

Dream Sequence

As Erik walked around the castle, he noticed a bunch of colorful statues littered around the entire castle grounds.

Erik: Wow, they look so realistic....

Then he noticed.

Erik: Wait... these aren't statues... they're frozen!

Erik quickly spun around rapidly, wondering what could have frozen everything.

Erik: I need... I need to see the outside.

But when he reached the gates, he found them closed, and he found the castle was in fact... not ruined... he was trapped inside.

On september 1, 2014
EoNightcore

DreamErik overlooked the castle walls, and found himself not in a hellish volcanic land, but in a green lush land that was devastated by war.

Quite the major change, considering not 20 minutes earlier the land was nothing but volcanic.

However, beyond the walls, was a huge force of people, with siege cannons and knights and archers and peasants, and just about everything was in that army. Dragons, elves, humans, dwarves, gods, orcs... orcs?... who would be evil enough that orcs would assist their mortal enemies?

Erik looked behind him to the great dark castle, whatever answer he seeked for would no doubt be in there. He could hear whispers lingering at his very thoughts, telling him to head there.

On september 1, 2014
[5367939]
EoNightcore

Yes, this idea is the one that often works best.

Also, I vote for everyone to use NPCs, instead of asking another player to do it for them, unless they are extremely bad at story-telling.

This is also true, asking others is like asking to 'slow down' the story telling.

Show us your strength in story telling!

or not... if you are bad at it

On september 1, 2014
EoNightcore

Consider all that has been said, new rules have been made for the old ones! I show to you!

The Constitution of the The Open Story

  • Rule 1: No directly controlling another Player's PC. Influencing is different.
    • Rule 1.1: You may allow someone to control your PC, just make sure to give them a basic briefing on how they act, wouldn't want your pacifistic priest to kill 3000 people while you're away.
    • Rule 1.2: No using another Player's character for out-of-character actions. So no using that pacifistic priest to kill 3000 people.

  • Rule 2: You are free to control the NPCs, so don't make other players do it!
    • Rule 2.1: Unless you are completely bad at story-telling.

  • Rule 3: When you introduce a new character, please state if they are a PC, if they are a PC of yours.

  • Rule 4: Only 4 PCs in one group.

  • Rule 5: No controlling one entire government/organization/nation/big group/etc, unless you have been given the "King" Title
    • Rule 5.1: To get "King" Status, you must apply, if the majority of voters vote yes, then rule 4 and 5 no longer applies to you.

  • Rule 6: If you are gone for 2 days, your characters will be NPCed until you return. If anyone decides to move them that is.

  • Rule 7: Please, no Rule 34, think of the children!

DreamErik had been exploring the castle for a very... very.... very long time, and if he could say anything about it, it was that it was bigger then it seemed.

He entered room after room after room, in one case entering and exiting the same room over and over again, he wasn't sure how he got out of that one.

On september 4, 2014
[5367939]
GreatestKrackenYour adenaline should have been when the danger started for sa short amount of time, giving a crazy bonus, like +60 or +50

That would indeed be a crazy bonus.

light research suggests we don't normally use 100% of muscle capability. [there is of course long boring explain for why this is]

then adrenalin and what they label 'hysteric strength' kicks in and for a few minutes {one or two it seems like} they can do crazy stuff like lift a 3,500 pound car.

Of course 'usually' the immanent danger passes fairly quickly in most real life situations, so they are able to have their body release the 'anti-panic mode' chemicals and mostly return to normal.

However, what triggers 'hysteric strength' is not well known or science tested. Since that would be unethical. hey let's drop cars on grandpas to test hysteric strength! = gets put in jail

It is of course a bad thing if you remain in 'hysteric mode' for a longer period of time, as your body is working 'overtime', and this has consequences. [more long explain]

The main issue at hand with 'winning' up here, as she will, unless the RNG trolls me

Is that escaping water {as in separating from it and no longer being covered by it} is difficult in a reality situation if the water moves with you.

How does one dislodge water? Your hands and feet simply move through it. Try to push a water wall without falling inside of it... or having your hand just go bloop [oh look my hand is in water.]

Without magic, or some implement to say, vaporize the water {heat}. Or freeze it {cold}.

I can't think of a real situation where a npc human female can 'dislodge' water...

GreatestKrackenSecret adrenaline magic.

See? "Magic".


Also, how does magic work in this world?

Is it something given by the gods? Like Lune giving out werewolf transforming powers to a Lunatic merely for fun?

Is it passed down genetically? Magic-capable people are more likely to create more magic-capable people.

Is it determined by some higher power then the Gods? Which would be us, the Puppeteers, or as we are known to the Gods, the Creators.

Is it just plain random? It just appears in someone at will and not at will because RNG.

Does everyone have it? Basically, anyone can use it, but only a few are OP.

Also, how does magic work in this world?

Is it something given by the gods? Like Lune giving out werewolf transforming powers to a Lunatic merely for fun?

Is it passed down genetically? Magic-capable people are more likely to create more magic-capable people.

Is it determined by some higher power then the Gods? Which would be us, the Puppeteers, or as we are known to the Gods, the Creators.

Is it just plain random? It just appears in someone at will and not at will because RNG.

Does everyone have it? Basically, anyone can use it, but only a few are OP.

Everyone, but most people have very little/no idea how to use it/no idea it exists (most people)

Flashback (Does anyone read these?)Demon LordSo, it ends.Hero pulled out his blade, and Demon Lord collapsed.Hero...He exited the throne room.

In time Hero would return home to and would return a champion of all mankind, but he never told Humanity that the Demon Lord would return.

A 100 years passed, and humanity was once again fighting amongst themselves, several years after the former Hero left on yet another adventure.

And that was when the Demon Lord struck, forcing mankind to yet again see their homes destroyed, and their cities burned to the ground.

The second generation of Heroes who would defeat the Demon Lord would be the children of Hero, as his power knew no bounds, especially when it came to the matter of his Harem.
NarratorLucky Bastard...

And thus the cycle continued, until now.
